Title: Includes seizure detecting monitors for certain infants under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients
Summary: Includes seizure detecting monitors for certain infants under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients; limits coverage for such monitors to no more than $150.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to including seizure detecting monitors for certain infants under standard coverage for Medicaid recipients
